effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.sun-moon: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
